Package gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.monsters

Class Fly

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.GameObject
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.NonStaticObject
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.monsters.Monster
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.monsters.FlyingMonster
gameobjects.nonstaticobjects.monsters.Fly
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Fly
extends FlyingMonster
A fly is a FlyingMonster that can shoot projectile from a distance.

To check what the other variable from Spider are please refer to Monster , NonStaticObject and GameObject.

See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Fly​(Vector2 position, Room room)
    Constructs a new fly whose position is specified with a Vector2 argument, and whose room is specified by a Room argument.
